title: go utilities inconsistently accept -V flag
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. cd $GOBIN
2. for f in *;do if test -x $f;then $f -v;fi;done

What is the expected output?
A long list of the same thing - the version of go.

What do you see instead?
Some version messages, a lot of error messages.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux, amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
112def17ab12+ tip
